- [<clear> element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/clear-element-for-custom-2.md): Learn more about: <clear> element for NameValueSectionHandler and DictionarySectionHandler
- [<configSections> element for <configuration>](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/configsections-element-for-configuration.md): Learn more about: <configSections> element for <configuration>

- [Configuration file schema for .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md): Learn more about: Configuration file schema for .NET Framework
- [<linkedConfiguration> element](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/linkedconfiguration-element.md): Learn more about: <linkedConfiguration> element
